      • onAnnotDragStart

        public void onAnnotDragStart(boolean has_goto,
                    boolean has_popup)
        Description copied from interface: com.radaee.pdfex.PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
        fired when an annotation is selected.
        Specified by:
        onAnnotDragStart in interface com.radaee.pdfex.PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
        Parameters:
        has_goto - is selected annotation has action that PDF library support?
        has_popup - is selected annotation has popup window to edit text note?
        if has_popup = true:
        can get note text by PDFView.annotGetText, and get title by PDFView.annotGetSubject.
        and set note text by PDFView.annotSetText, and get title by PDFView.annotSetSubject.

      • onAnnotEditBox

        public void onAnnotEditBox(int type,
                  java.lang.String val,
                  float text_size,
                  float left,
                  float top,
                  float right,
                  float bottom)
        Description copied from interface: com.radaee.pdfex.PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
        fired when an edit-box is clicked.
        Specified by:
        onAnnotEditBox in interface com.radaee.pdfex.PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
        Parameters:
        type -
        0: single line edit-box.
        1: password edit-box.
        2: MultiLine edit-box.
        val - current value of edit-box.
        text_size - text size.
        left - left coordinate in view
        top - top coordinate in view
        right - right coordinate in view
        bottom - bottom coordinate in view
